class Solution:
    def minChanges(self, nums: List[int], k: int) -> int:
        n = len(nums)
        diffs = [0]*(n//2)
        in1 = []
        for i in range(n//2):
            a = nums[i]
            b = nums[n-i-1]
            diffs[i] = abs(a-b)
            in1.append(max(max(a, b)-0, k-min(a, b)))
        #print(diffs)
        in1.sort()
        freq = Counter(diffs)
        best = inf
        #print(in1)
        for d, f in freq.items():
            idx = bisect_left(in1, d)
            #print(d, idx)
            best = min(best, idx*2+n//2-idx-f)
        return best
